title: Mystery Sans
content:
Very cool looking sans... any ideas?

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122062553im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/bvd1_4708.jpg)

 [‹ marshmallow fluff logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122062553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48724 "Go to previous forum topic") [pixie studio logo typeface? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122062553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48730 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BrooklynRob

comments.content: Closest I’ve come so far is [Neuzeit S](http://web.archive.org/web/20081122062553/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/neuzeit_s_std_book_heavy/?sample_text=G%C3%96TGATAN%20STORIES) but that’s definitely not a match.
This seems to be a tough one huh? I gotta find out what this is. I even emailed the studio but they haven’t replied.
